definitions.definition: One who reduces religion to strict interpretation of core or original texts.
A trader who trades on the financial fundamentals of the companies involved, as opposed to a chartist or technician.

Originally referred to an adherent of an American Christian movement that began as a response to the rejection of the accuracy of the Bible, the alleged deity of Christ , Christ's atonement for humanity, the virgin birth , and miracles .

main_definition: One who reduces religion to strict interpretation of core or original texts.
secondary_definitions: ( finance ) A trader who trades on the financial fundamentals of the companies involved, as opposed to a chartist or technician.

( Christianity ) Originally referred to an adherent of an American Christian movement that began as a response to the rejection of the accuracy of the Bible, the alleged deity of Christ , Christ's atonement for humanity, the virgin birth , and miracles .
